* Attempts to load tasks from duke.txt specified in filePath into a TaskList instance.
* Creates an empty TaskList instance if the file cannot be found.
* @param filePath Path to the duke.txt containing the saved tasks.
* Method to run the Duke program sequence.
ui.dukePrompt("Boss, I've got my notebook ready with " + tasks.getSize() + " tasks in it");
* Main method. Entry point for the Duke program.
public static void main(final String[] args) {
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws DukeException {
taskPrompt = "Oooh, important deadline eh, boss? Don't worry, I got it";
taskPrompt = "Got it, boss. I'll write this one down";
taskPrompt = "A special event I see. Don't worry boss, I'll remind you";
* @param tasks TaskList instance of Duke program.
* @param ui UI instance of Duke program.
* @param storage Storage instance of Duke program.
* @throws DukeException DukeException thrown when command cannot be executed successfully.
public abstract void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws DukeException;
* Check if the command is an exit command.
* @return A boolean if the command is an exit command.
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws DukeException {
ui.dukePrompt(new String[]{"Aaaaand deleted! Don't kill me if it's the wrong one, boss",
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws DukeException {
ui.dukePrompt(new String[]{"Got it boss! Just to confirm, this is the one I marked as done",
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws DukeException {
ui.dukePrompt("Good bye, boss! Call me if you need me. I'll be waiting!");
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws DukeException {
temp = new String[]{"I couldn't find any tasks containing that keyword, boss. Try something else?"};
temp[0] = "I found these tasks that match what you might be looking for, boss!";
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws DukeException {
temp = new String[]{"Boss, my notepad is empty. You sure you told me anything?"};
temp[0] = "Here's what I've written down, boss.";
* @param errorCode An ErrorCode enum representing the error type.
* DukeException constructor with additional error information.
* @param errorCode An ErrorCode enum representing the error type.
* @param errorInfo A string containing any additional information.
message = "Sorry boss, I don't know that command. Try again, boss?";
message = "Boss, I hate to say this but you forgot to tell me what the task is...";
message = "Err boss, you forgot to tell me when the event is going to happen";
message = "Boss, I can't tell when it's due. Could you be a little clearer?";
message = "Boss, you do know there's not that many tasks right?";
message = "I don't understand the date, boss. Type the date like this YYYY-MM-DD";
message = "Boss, I can't find my notebook... Sorry but I can't find duke.txt";
message = "Oops boss, I've got trouble reading the duke.txt file, from line "
+ this.errorInfo + " onwards... I'll just stop here and load what I have";
message = "Oops boss, I've got trouble trying to save from this task ("
+ this.errorInfo + ") onwards... \nI'll just stop here and save what I have";
message = "Uh-oh boss, I don't feel so good...";
* Parses the full command input from the user and returns the appropriate command to be execute by caller.
* @param fullCommand String of the full command input by the user.
* @return A Command object based on the type of command parsed.
* @throws DukeException DukeException thrown if missing task information or unknown commands.
public static Command parse(String fullCommand) throws DukeException {
* @param filePath String path of the duke.txt file.
* Load the list of tasks from the file specified.
* @return An ArrayList containing the loaded tasks.
* @throws DukeException DukeException thrown if file is not found or any line not being parsed succesfully.
* Load the individual lines from the input file.
* @param taskString A string of the current line to be loaded from storage.
* @param lineNo The current index of the line in the file.
* @throws DukeException DukeException thrown if any line cannot be loaded.
private void loadTask(String taskString, int lineNo) throws DukeException {
* Overwrite the entire target file with the updated list of tasks and saves it.
* @param taskList The current list of tasks in the program.
* @throws DukeException DukeException thrown if any task cannot be written into the buffer before saving the file.
public void save(TaskList taskList) throws DukeException {
* @param deadlineArgs Joined string of the user input command arguements
* A method to return the details of the current Task object.
* Contains the task done status and the task name.
* @return A String representation of the task details.
* @param eventArgs Joined string of the user input command arguements
* A method to return the details of the current Task object.
* Contains the task done status and the task name.
* @return A String representation of the task details.
* Return a string of the details of the current Task object.
* Contains the task done status and the task name.
* @return A String representation of the task details.
return "Now you have " + this.getSize() + " tasks in the list";
// TODO: To handle this add() == false?
* Filter the tasks that contain the keyword as a substring.
* @param keyword String to find in the task names.
* @return An ArrayList containing tasks that contain the keyword as a substring.
* A method to return the details of the current Task object.
* Contains the task done status and the task name.
* @return A String representation of the task details.
this.dukePrompt(new String[]{"Hey boss! Duke here, at your service.", "What do you need me to do?"});

* @throws DukeException DukeException thrown when loading the tasks from input file.
Duke: Hey boss! Duke here, at your service.
What do you need me to do?
Duke: Oooh, this one's important eh, boss? I got it
Now you have 1 tasks in the list
Duke: A special event I see. Don't worry boss, I'll remind you
Now you have 2 tasks in the list
Duke: Got it, boss. I'll write this one down
Now you have 3 tasks in the list
Duke: Here's what I've written down, boss.
Duke: Good bye, boss! Call me if you need me. I'll be waiting!
